title: FYP #26 Pastor X and His Wife are Back {Update from Afghanistan}
description:
I’m sitting back down with our good friend Pastor X and his wife to get an update from The Middle East. As we talk about community, this is a whole different picture of what the church can do and what the church can be.

GIVE to Global Catalytic Ministries here: https://app.etapestry.com/onlineforms/GlobalCatalyticMinistriesInc/GCMdonations.html
